alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Eastern Fall River; Northern Jackson; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:49PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN OGLALA LAKOTA... SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN FALL RIVER AND NORTHWESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM MDT... At 1049 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Long Valley to 4 miles east of Red Cloud Campground. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Ridge, Oglala, Porcupine, Kyle, Wanblee, Potato Creek, Manderson, Allen, Wounded Knee, Long Valley, Batesland, Lonesome Valley, Loneman, Goose Neck Housing, Hisle, South Lakeside, Wakpamni, Sharps Corner, George Town, and Number 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Eastern Fall River; Northern Jackson; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota
